channel.title: Bans
channel.description: do i need a new banhandler code? cuz when i type te command ::ipban (playername) it only kicks that player and when i put there character in the "bans" folder it doesnt work but in the folder it says sumthing about ips.xml and names.xml help plz![br][size=1]Posted on: May 24, 2007, 06:20:13 AM[/size][hr]n e 1?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 24, 2007, 06:38:55 AM[/size][hr]=(
